arts.ttl: Saints 'will go down' says Juric as Wolves near safety
arts.sum: Ivan Juric says Southampton will be relegated from the Premier League this season after losing to Wolves, who take a huge stride towards top-flight safety.

arts.ttl: Strand Larsen's brace takes Wolves nine points clear of bottom three
arts.sum: Wolves doubled their advantage just two minutes into the second half, as poor defending from the hosts saw Strand Larsen shift on to his right foot and fire an effort into the bottom far corner. Southampton pulled a goal back with 15 minutes remaining through Paul Onuachu ’s rebounded finish after Tyler Dibling ’s shot had struck a post, but Wolves held on.

arts.ttl: I’m feeling this with my heart – Vitor Pereira enjoying Wolves challenge
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen’s brace at Southampton nmoved Wanderers nine points clear of third-bottom Ipswich.

arts.ttl: Pereira praises Strand Larsen after double at Southampton
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Vitor Pereira praises the performance of Jorgen Strand Larsen, who scored twice in a 2-1 win over Southampton.

arts.ttl: Everybody is disappointed - Juric on Southampton's tough season
arts.sum: Southampton manager Juric says that "everyone is disappointed" and it's been a "tough season" for all in their 2-1 loss to Wolves at home.

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-2 Wolves: Vitor Pereira makes demand after Jorgen Strand Larsen double secures big Premier League win
arts.sum: Head coach Vitor Pereira demands that his Wolverhampton Wanderers side avoid any complacency after their potentially-crucial 2-1 victory at Southampton in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Pereira warns Wolves ‘cannot feel safe’ despite huge Southampton win
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has warned Wolves that the club ‘cannot feel safe’ despite a crucial 2-1 win over Southampton on Saturday. Wolves moved nine points clear of the relegation places with a hard-fought win on the South Coast. Jorgen Strand Larsen’s double did the damage for the visitors, who held on for the points despite Paul […] The post Pereira warns Wolves ‘cannot feel safe’ despite huge Southampton win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

With half-time approaching, Pereira was urging his players forward and Rayan Ait-Nouri had two opportunities to double Wolves’ lead but after firing a shot straight at Ramsdale, he then trickled an effort well wide of the post after good work by Joao Gomes. Moments later, a Nelson Semedo cross looking for Strand Larsen and Marshall Munetsi was gathered by Aaron Ramsdale, but despite the visitors enjoying a lead, most of the first half chances fell Southampton’s way.

arts.ttl: Saints misery continues as Strand Larsen double secures huge Wolves win
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Southampton's match against Wolves in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-2 Wolves: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Wolves prevent late comeback
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers edge closer to Premier League survival with a 2-1 win over Southampton at St Mary's Stadium.
